XTC

lol i made a clan called XTC if you ever want to check it out go right ahead its going to be the wildest funnest clan out there anyways i g2g peace!!!!

DREAMS

I have one ? you ever had a dream that you wished was real?!? like lets say you dream you find the right one the one you love for the rest of your life and then you wake up and realize that the one your wit has none of the characteristics of the one you want to be wit in your dream?? After that you meet someone who just steals your heart and you want to be wit them for the rest of your life but that person is already taken?? wat do you do?? do you give up?? or would you keep chasin after your dreams??

PUNK ROCK

hey im bored and thought i would see wat people thought im a true punk rock but these other punk wannabees like 3 days grace and green day are givin true punks a bad name punk is hed pe and us demon rage we dont give a fuck wat government thinks about us we are true punks that dont turn back we never die but i just want to see if theres anyone out there willin to say were not punk listen to our music and tell us if were not all these fakers are getting annoying want to here wat true punk is listen to HED PE or even us DEMON RAGE we are the groups that government tries to get rid of because we tell the truth about them instead of lies were true to punk but the ? is are you?!?!?

Dee A.K.A. XTC....

YOUR OPINIONS AND MINE

WELL IM FUCKIN BACK WITH ANOTHER ONE YEAH BOI LOL ANYWAYS I JUST WANTED PEOPLE TO KNOW THAT IF YOU DONT LIKE MY OPNIONS I COULD CARE LESS BECAUSE MOST LIKELY I DONT LIKE YOURS EITHER SO LETS JUST HAVE FUNN AND BE WILD AND CRAZY AND A LIL FUCKED UP BECAUSE HELL WE ONLY HAVE ONE LIFE TO LIVE AND YOU SURE AS HELL DONT WANT TO BE BORED FOR YOUR LIFE GOD COME ON GET REAL PEOPLE FORGET SAFETY LETS HAVE FUNN PEACE!!!

DEE(ECSTASY'S FUCKIN BACK)

SOMEONE ONCE TOLD ME TO CARE WAT THE WORLD FEELS!!!!

LISTEN IM BACK WITH ANOTHER BLOG BUT OH WELL DEAL WIT IT IM NOT PLANNIN ON DYIN ANYTIME SOON BUT I GOT SOMETHIN TO SAY TO THESE LIL FCKIN HATERS WHO ACT HARD AND TOUGH WELL GUESS WAT......NO ONES FALLIN FOR IT THE WORLD COULD CARE LESS THE PEOPLE IN THIS WORLD ARE GETTIN MORE CORRUPT LISTEN ITS TIME FOR OUR GENERATION TO STEP UP AND SAY WAT WE HAVE ON OUR MINDS BECAUSE IF WE HOLD BACK THEN HOW ARE WE SUPPOSE TO HAVE FUNN AND LIVE OUR LIFE TO THE FULLEST FUCK SAFETY AND FCK PEOPLE WHO THINK WERE CRAZY LIFE IS SOMETHIN WE CANT TAKE LITELY BUT WE ALSO CANT JUST SIT AROUND AND LET OUR GENERATION BE THE ONE TO DESTROY US SO COME GUYS AND GIRLS LETS GET UP OFF OUR ASSES AND GET OUT THERE IVE SEEN ALOT OF TALK IN MY LIFE "OH YEAH I DID THIS....AND THIS..." YEAH WELL STOP TALKIN ABOUT AND DO IT NOW WHERE WE CAN SEE THE TRUTH AND PROVE YOUR NOT SOME FUCKIN HATER OR FUCKIN LIAR I HATE THEM!!!!! BTW FOR THE 2 GIRLS WHO AGREED WIT MY LAST BLOG THNKZ ALOT AND HOPE YOU READ THIS ONE TO BECAUSE THERE NEEDS TO BE MORE PEOPLE OUT THERE AGREEING WIT THIS SHIT BECAUSE IF YOUR IN THIS GENERATION GET YOUR ASSES UP RIGHT FUCKIN NOW!!!! HELL YEAH PEACE PEOPLE

DEE(ECSTASY'S MOTHER FUCKIN BACK)

BACK WITH ANOTHER ONE NOT DYIN YET!!!!!

ALRIGHT IM BACK AND I JUST WANT PEOPLE TO KNOW THAT WHEREVER LIFE TAKES YA DONT EVER BACK DONT AND LET THESE HATERS PULL DOWN BECAUSE EVERYONE WAS MEANT FOR SOMETHIN AND I FUCKIN BELIEVE THAT ANYBODY CAN GO FROM A NOBODY TO A SOMEBODY IN NO TIME BECAUSE LIFE IS FUCKED UP MOST OF THE TIME BUT SO AM I LOL SO JUST DONT SIT BACK AND ENJOY THE RIDE GET UP HAVE A FUCKIN BLAST AND LET PEOPLE KNOW WHO YOU ARE AND WAT YOU WANT!!!! DONT BACK THE FUCK KEEP PUSHIN!!!!

DEE(ECSTASY'S FUCKIN BACK WITH ANOTHER ONE)

ITS TIME TO LIVE WITHOUT FEAR!!!!

LET ME SEE HOW MANY PEOPLE WILL AGREE WIT ME ON THIS SUBJECT,FEAR IS SOMETHIN IN YOUR HEAD YOU OVERCOME IT YOU CAN ACTUALLY LEARN TO ENJOY IT.PEOPLE HAVE A TENDANCY TO NOT WANT TO FACE THEIR FEARS WELL YOU DONT FACE YOUR FEARS YOULL NEVER BE ABLE TO LIVE LIFE TO THE FULLEST SO I WANT YOU GUYS AND GIRLS TO THINK ABOUT ALL THE FEARS IN YOUR LIFE AND THEN JUST FUCK EM AND NOT BE SCARED TO SAY WAT YOU WANT OR DO WAT YOU WANT DONT BE AFRAID YOUR WHOLE LIFE AND RUN FROM YOUR FEAR TURN AROUND AND FUCKIN FACE IT AND CONQUER IT.WHEN YA DO THAT YOULL BE ABLE TO HAVE FUNN WIT YOUR LIFE AND ENJOY EVERY WAKING MOMENT!!!

DEE(ECSTASY'S FUCKIN BACK)

VALENTINES DAY YEP ITS ME AGAIN!!!

WELL PEOPLE ITS TIME TO PUT YOUR ANGER AWAY AND ENJOY TODAY WHETHER YOUR ALONE OR NOT JUST ENJOY IT AND DONT WORRY ABOUT BEING ALONE BECAUSE THINK OF IT THIS WAY VALENTINES DAY IS FOR PEOPLE WHO LOVED ONES WELL THINK OF EVERYONE WHOS HELPED YOU IN THE PAST AND PRESENT AND WHOS BEEN THERE FOR YOU THROUGH THICK AND THIN BECAUSE OF WAT THEY DID THEY SHOWED LOVE TO YOU SO WHAT YA SHOULD IS CALL EM AND WISH THEM A HAPPY VALENTINES BECAUSE NO MATTER WAT THERE IS SOMEONE OUT THERE FOR YOU YOU NEVER KNOW IT MIGHT BE YOUR BEST FRIEND THAT YOU SECRETLY HAVE A CRUSH ON AND HE/SHE MIGHT HAVE A CRUSH ON YOU NEVER KNOW UNTIL YOU ASK SO IM GOIN TO LEAVE YALL BE FOR NOW BUT ILL BE BACK LATER TRUST ME PEACE!!!!

DEE(ECSTASY'S BACK)

WELL ITS ME AGAIN OF COURSE LETS SEE WAT YA THINK?!?

WELL PEOPLE IM HERE AGAIN AND IM NEVER BACKIN DOWN ANYWAYS IF ANYONE AGREES WIT THIS I WANT TO KNOW SO TELL ME PLEASSSSEEEE LOL....ANYWAYS I WANT TO SEE HOW MANY PEOPLE THINK ITS WEIRD HOW PEOPLE STEREOTYPE OTHER PEOPLE AND MAKE UP RULES LIKE LETS SEE HERE YOU CANT TALK TO CERTAIN PEOPLE EITHER BECAUSE IT WILL LOWER YOUR REP OR ITS EMBERRASING WELL BULLSHIT PEOPLE WHO TREAT OTHERS LIKE SHIT BECAUSE THERE SCARED OF WAT THERE FRIENDS MIGHT THINK OR THERE REP MIGHT BE ON THE LINE FUCK THAT THOSE PEOPLE ARE SHIT AND THEY CAN GO TO HELL FOR ALL I CARE BECAUSE EVERYONE IS A HUMAN BEING NO ONE DESERVES TO BE TREATED LIKE SHIT UNLESS THEY DESERVE IT NOT BECAUSE THERE DIFFERENT AND IF YOU DONT AGREE WIT ME THEN YOU BETTER FUCKIN HAVE A GOOD REASON NOT TO ANYWAYS ILL LEAVE YOU GOOD PEOPLE ALONE SOOOO PEACE EVERYONE ENJOY LIFE AND HAVE FUNN DO STUPID CRAZY SHIT AND LIVE IT TO THE FULLEST PEACE!!!!

DEE(ECSTASY'S MOTHER FUCKIN BACK)

ARE YOU LIKE ME ARE YOU IMPERFECT BUT STILL LOVE IT!!!!!

I JUST WANT TO SEE HOW MANY PEOPLE ARE LIKE ME WE DONT CARE WAT PEOPLE THINK AND WE ARENT AFRAID TO LET PEOPLE KNOW HOW WE FEEL LOOK CLOSE AT YOURSELF B-4 YOU ANSWER THIS ? ARE YOU REALLY SOMEONE WHO DOESNT CARE ABOUT PEOPLE MAKIN FUNN OF YOU BECAUSE YOULL JUST STARTIN MAKIN FUNN OF YOURSELF WIT EM LOL AND JUST START FUCKIN WIT THERE HEAD I JUST WANT TO KNOW HOW MANY PEOPLE OUT THERE DONT NEED MONEY TO BE HAPPY WIT THERE LIFE THEY CAN FIND FUNN IN THE SIMPLEST WAYS AND JUST GO WIT THE FLOW OF LIFE SMILIN BEING HAPPY AND KNOWING THAT PEOPLE MIGHT TALK ABOUT YOU FOR WAT YOU DO BUT YOU COULD REALLY NOT GIVE A DAMN ABOUT WAT THEY THINK YOU JUST WANT TO HAVE FUNN ENJOY LIFE AS IT IS AND NOT TURN BACK JUST KEEP PUSHIN AND DREAMIN OF A DEATH WHERE YOU DIE HAPPY KNOWIN YOU DID THE MOST THAT YOU COULD WIT YOUR LIFE KNOWING ITS FAR FROM OVER WANTIN MORE AND PUSHIN AND STRIVING TO GET NO MATTER HOW DUMB OR STUPID IT IS TO PEOPLE BUT TO YOU IT MEANS SOMETHING TO YOU AND THATS WAT MATTERS THE MOST IN LIFE ANYWAYS HAVIN FUNN LIVIN IT TO THE FULLEST SMILIN AND JUST BEIN WHO YOU ARE AND PROUD OF BEIN WHO YOU ARE!!!!!! WELL IM OUTTA HERE BUT HOPE YOU PEOPLE WILL AGREE WIT ME AND HOPE TO HEAR YOU GUYS SAY YOU LIKE WAT I SAY LOL IT WOULD MAKE ME A LIL HAPPIER LOL BUT LIKE I SAID BEFORE IF YOU DONT TOUGH SHIT BECAUSE IDC IF YOU DO THNKZ ALOT AND I HOPE YOU WILL KEEP READIN EM AND EVEN CHAT WIT ME ON HERE FOR A WHILE WELL PEACE EVERYONE HAVE FUNN WIT LIFE!!!!

DEE(ECSTASY'S FUCKIN BACK)

WHEN IM GONE

EVER THOUGHT ABOUT WAT IT WOULD BE LIKE WHEN YOUR GONE HOW PEOPLE WILL REACT?? WILL PEOPLE MISS YOU?? WELL LET ME GIVE YOU SOMETHIN TO THINK ABOUT YOU GET OLDER AS THE DAYS GO BY YOU NEVER KNOW WHEN ONE DAY YOULL DIE...MOST OF US HAVE LOST LOVED ONES AND IVE MET FEW WHO HAVENT AND THEY ARE VERY VERY LUCKY BECAUSE THEY STILL HAVE A CHANCE TO MAKE THINGS RIGHT AND TELL THEM THEY LOVE THEM WHETHER FRIEND FAMILY GF OR BF JUST TELL EM B-4 YOU CANT.....B-4 YOU START TO REGRET IT AND YOU REALIZE THAT ITS TOO LATE AND THERE GONE.....I JUST WANT TO SAY ONE MORE THING B-4 I GO PEOPLE WHO YOU LOSE ARE NOT GONE 4-EVER THEYLL ALWAYS BE IN YOUR DREAMS AND YOUR HEART SO JUST KEEP LOVIN EM EVEN WHEN THERE GONE DONT EVER STOP....
R.I.P. DREW,STACY,MATT,RICKY,LISA...

DEE(ECSTASY'S BACK)

WHATS THE POINT?!?

ANYONE COME ON PEOPLE TELL ME WAT IS THE ONE THING YOU WANT BAD IN LIFE AND YOU WOULD DO ANYTHING TO GET IT!!!!....BUT GUESS WAT YA CANT HAVE IT LOL JUST COME ON PEOPLE IM BORED HERE AND I NEED TO KNOW WAT YOU PEOPLE THINK ABOUT COME ON ITS YOUR TURN TO TELL ME WAT YA WANT AND WAT YA NEED INSTEAD OF ME TELLIN YALL WAT TO TALK ABOUT THIS TIME YOU TALK ABOUT WAT EVA YA WANT TO!!!!
